tweet: Tune in to @mysuncoast tonight at 7:30 PM to see my latest interview and hear what I’ve been working on in Washington, DC!

This Memorial Day, we remember those who gave their last full measure of devotion in service to our country. I applaud @realDonaldTrump for his nomination of Mark Morgan to serve as ICE Director. The situation on our southern border is dire and we need a qualified, experienced leader to stop the flood of illegal immigrants into our nation. I look forward to working with Mr. Morgan.

Happy National Orange Juice Day! As the nation’s top citrus producer, my district is home to many of Florida’s delicious oranges that deliver tasty orange juice around the world. Orange juice is an important part of our economy and heritage. Enjoy a glass of @OJfromFlorida today! pic.twitter.com/ihMicXpKWX
